headline: A Look At Raymond James Financial (RJF) Valuation After Growth Signals And Investment Banking Expansion
summary: Why Raymond James Financial is on investors’ radar right now Raymond James Financial (RJF) has attracted fresh attention after hiring Michael Baca as a managing director in its Technology & Services Investment Banking group, reinforcing its focus on vertical software, integrated payments, government technology, and mobility. See our latest analysis for Raymond James Financial. That hire comes as Raymond James Financial’s share price has climbed to US$170.89, with a 4.3% 30 day share price...
